body:
• Given as a list of "phases" in the form:
    {"phasetype":{...spec...}} where
    • "phasetype" can be "map", "reduce" or "link"
    • Each spec can include a "keep" value (boolean), indicates if data from the phase should be returned
  • "map" and "reduce" phases share the same format but
    • Map phases extract, parse and process data one key at a time
    • Reduce phases aggregate the work done on the set of inputs
